articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: A new year wish for good health - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Major achievements in medical science in 2023 include mRNA technology for vaccines, CRISPR gene editing, 3D printing of human organs, and new drugs for weight loss and Alzheimer's. Utilization of continuous personal monitoring systems and artificial intellige…
articles.content: To pen a column for the first of January can be an onerous task. Whether you like it or not, you are bound by an overwhelming idea. That another year has drawing to a close and a new one is just star… [+5970 chars]
